answers.answer: That's too vague to answer. Opticians are not ophthalmologist eye MDs.JCH MD

question: I have been an insulin dependent diabetic for 20 years now and have yearly retinal screening photograph checks.  I have just had results back and the letter said 'there were no problems cause by diabetes.'  However they have noted a 'non diabetes related issue that may require further assessment'.I have had to make an appointment at my doctors to find out more but was not able to get an appointment until Wednesday.I am really worried! What could be wrong with me and how could they know from a photograph?  I regularly go to to the opticians and they have never noted anything before...
title: Worried about retinal screening result
